title: You’ll find little or no avalanche risk at these 4 backcountry ski touring spots
description: Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradual slopes on trails that serve as easy hikes in the summer.
content: Backcountry skiing means different things to different people. For some it means climbing hundreds of feet up beautiful peaks on pristine slopes in search of powder turns, which requires advanced ski… [+4972 chars]
de: An diesen 4 Backcountry-Skitourengebieten besteht kaum oder gar keine Lawinengefahr. Beim Backcountry-Skitourengehen geht es um deutlich flachere Hänge auf Wegen, die im Sommer als leichte Wanderungen dienen.
en: You’ll find little or no avalanche risk at these 4 backcountry ski touring spots. Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradual slopes on trails that serve as easy hikes in the summer.
la: Minimum aut nullum avalanche periculum invenies in his 4 scopis ski maculis variandis. Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradal slopes on calles that serve as easy hikes in summer.
